main event: Mr. and Mrs. observed a bright light in the sky while driving from Dexter, New Mexico to Roswell on 22 November 1966.
interesting points: The couple watched the light for about 20 minutes as it hovered and changed positions., The light shot straight up and was described as a blinking white light., They followed the object to Roswell, where it moved off to the south., The object exhibited high speeds, hovering capabilities, and made sharp turns., They estimated the object was about 20 degrees in size.
sighted object: a bright white light in the sky
witness description: a married couple driving in a car
